for_sales.sales_text:
A very seaworthy shallow draft gaff cutter built in 1995, "Saorsa" has a fibreglass hull, moulded on the lines of a traditional wooden boat.

LOA 24", LOD 19"
Draft centreboard up 18', Draft centreboard down 4"
Engine Tohatsu 5Hp 4 stoke outboard.
Sails: main, jib, staysail and topsail.
Accommodation: rear locker, spacious cockpit cabin with 2 berths twin burner stove and sink area with anchor locker and sail storage in bow.
Sale includes braked road trailer, anchor and chain, berth cushions.
Ready to sail and for a 19" shallow drafter, very seaworthy!

boat.full_description:
Saorsa is a Memory 19, the first of the modern Memory 19's to be built with a cabin. Most earlier versions of the Memory with cabins have been modified at a later stage.

She has spent most of her days sailing in Scottish waters from the Isle of Arran and the Clyde to the Solway Coast.
boat.name: Saorsa
boat.short_description: Saorsa is a Memory 19, built from new with a cabin
